text:
<@U25PYL3Q8>

Turns out the issue was this…

“It seems that the symptoms here were due to a temporary glitch caused by an update. The person in charge made improvements three hours ago and cleared the cache, and it has been confirmed that the ‘Next Article’ link in the second article is rendering the latest one properly.”

Thanks a big lot for reaching out though. Really appreciate the help!
Well — I recreated a template to go through all of this on Friday and couldn’t duplicate this issue no matter how hard I tried, glad this was just a temporary issue
